snippet: Mike Pereira, the former N.F.L. director of officials, wrote that the side judge Laird Hayes "faced the biggest call of his career -- and nailed it."
abstract: Mike Pereira, the former N.F.L. director of officials, wrote that the side judge Laird Hayes "faced the biggest call of his career -- and nailed it."
lead_paragraph: Mike Pereira of Fox Sports was effusive in his praise of the officiating in the Super Bowl on Sunday. Pereira, the former N.F.L. director of officials, wrote that the side judge Laird Hayes "faced the biggest call of his career" - on whether Mario Manningham kept his feet inbounds while maintaining possession on a 38-yard reception on the Giants' winning drive -- and Hayes "nailed it":

headline.main: High Praise for Super Bowl Officiating
